byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Air Ministry revs 1st war yr; predicts plane parity
snippet: LONDON, Sept. 1--In a review of the first year of the war in the air the Air Ministry tonight declared that "by weight of numbers the enemy is attempting to break down our fighter defense and cripple our industry....

headline.main: BRITISH SURE R.A.F. CAN HOLD OFF FOE; THEIR VOYAGE TO CANADA HALTED BY U-BOAT'S TORPEDO

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 1--In a review of the first year of the war in the air the Air Ministry tonight declared that "by weight of numbers the enemy is attempting to break down our fighter defense and cripple our industry.
